rationale: The segment describes quarantine and culling actions and mentions no human cases (calming cue) but no intensifier/comparative + risk-adjective.
The segment describes actions and human cases factually; 'killed off' is factual (culling).
'will also be quarantined and killed off' denotes a plan/future action, not realised impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports factual actions (quarantined, killed) and a bare negation ('no human cases... have been detected') which is handled by Q7.
The segment mentions killing birds and no human cases (Q5). No Q6 pattern.
Contains bare negation 'so far no human cases... have been detected'.
